dataset_id: BOREAS Level-0 AOCI Imagery: Digital Counts in BIL Format
title: BOREAS Level-0 AOCI Imagery: Digital Counts in BIL Format
summary: The level-0 AOCI imagery, along with the other remotely sensed images, was collected to provide spatially extensive information about radiant energy over the primary BOREAS study areas.  The AOCI was the only remote sensing instrument flown with wavelength bands specific to the investigation of various aquatic parameters such as chlorophyll content and turbidity.
